ms.view

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ms.view.Counter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Counter
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This is a reusable UI component as a counter showing the number of mines and time.
    Author:
    harika
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
